detail_desc: Two pouch bags and a card holder on a metal ring. The metal ring can be opened, making it easy to add or remove accessories of your choice. One pouch bag in imitation leather and one in imitation suede, both with a zip at the top. Card holder in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with two card slots. Diameter of ring 10 cm. Size of card holder 7x10 cm. Size of pouches 9.5x13 cm and 12x16.5 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and draping at one side.
Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 65 cm and 77 cm.
Pull-on jeans in printed stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist, a fake fly and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.
Blouse in airy mesh with a shimmering pattern. Small, gathered stand-up collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Unlined.
Wide waist belt in quilted imitation leather with a large round metal buckle. Width 5 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal and bamboo. Diameter 4 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and long sleeves.

Dungarees in washed cotton denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with fasteners at the front, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky, patterned trainer soles. Height of soles 5 cm.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with a round neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.

Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. Wide, cropped legs with one leg pocket that has a pleat and one leg pocket that has a flap and decorative zip.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 10 cm.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small, frilled stand-up collar, buttons at the top, long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated waist and long sleeves with a seam at the elbows and flare to the cuffs. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V neck and lace back. Seam at the waist and long, flared lace sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline front and back, 3/4-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline front and back, 3/4-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Slightly shorter at the front with ties at the hem.
Short jacket in soft pile with a double-layered hood, concealed press-studs down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short jacket in soft pile with a double-layered hood, concealed press-studs down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined hood, a zip down the front, flap front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined hood, a zip down the front, flap front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Thickly padded puffer jacket with a stand-up collar, contrasting colour zip down the front and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Short, wide coat in supersoft pile with notch lapels, buttons down the front and large patch pockets. Lined.
Long, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Long, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short, straight-cut jacket in fluffy faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Pile jacket with a wide collar, zip down the front, discreet side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Blouse in sequined, airy mesh with embroidery. Small opening with ties at the neck and a frill at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. Lined with a sewn-in jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a turtle neck, roll edges and long wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Decorative seam down the front and back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a turtle neck, roll edges and long wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Decorative seam down the front and back.
Unicorn-shaped slippers in soft faux fur with appliqués and embroidery. Faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Three thin metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length from 38-44 cm to 86-92 cm.

TOCA LIFE x H&M. Sports jacket in patterned fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.

Short dress in jacquard-weave satin with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, a seam and covered elastication at the waist, and a circular skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Lined triangle bikini top with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Ties at the back and back of the neck. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Lined triangle bikini top with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Ties at the back and back of the neck. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Long-sleeved base layer top in soft wool jersey. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Base layer tights in soft wool jersey with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and elastication at the back, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Metal keyring and carabiner hook with an imitation leather strap. Length approx. 14 cm.

Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with an embroidered motif on the chest and a large, embroidered appliqué on the back. Sleeves in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with quilted elbow patches and ribbed cuffs. Collar, press-studs down the front and fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Shirt in washed cotton denim with a print motif. Collar, press-studs down the front, open chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.

Straight-cut, double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with notch lapels, front pockets with a decorative flap and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long raglan sleeves with a sewn-on tab at the cuffs, and a box pleat at the back for extra width to the hem. Unlined.
